incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the root cause and partially fixed three (Node, Java, and c#) helper libraries. Our engineering team is actively working to release new versions of Python and Go helpers as well. We recommend upgrading to latest versions for the fixed libraries. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue with Twilio helper libraries and are working to deploy a fix. Current workaround is using go: v1.19.0 https://github.com/twilio/twilio-go/releases/tag/v1.19.0, node: 4.23.0 https://www.npmjs.com/package/twilio/v/4.23.0, python: 8.13.0, java: 9.16.0 https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.twilio.sdk/twilio/9.16.0, c#: 6.18.0 https://www.nuget.org/packages/Twilio/6.18.0. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours as engineering will be fixing the issue in the next release.

Engineers continue to investigate a service interruption with Python helper library release 9.0.0.  Customers can't use the latest version of the helper library for certain requests. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption with Python helper library release 9.0.0.  Customers can't use the latest version of the helper library for certain requests. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Python helper library release 9.0.0 . Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Important Notice: Messaging Restrictions During Russian Presidential Elections

incident_updates.body: Please be informed that from March 15th to 17th, 2024, in accordance with Russian Federal Law, our carrier partners have informed us that messages pertaining to election campaigning may be blocked during the presidential elections in Russia.  We apologise in advance for the inconvenience this may cause.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Netherlands Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - KPN

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner KPN is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 March 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 16 March 2024 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for KPN customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes
